Package dao

Class DBDivisionImpl

java.lang.Object
dao.DBDivisionImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
DBDivision
public class DBDivisionImpl extends Object implements DBDivision
This class provides the division implementation methods to the customer appointment application. This class implements the DBCountry class

    • getAllDivision

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Division> getAllDivision()
      This observable list is to get all divisions. This method accesses the database and returns all divisions where the country IDs matches then is added to the observable list.
      Specified by:
      getAllDivision in interface DBDivision
      Returns:
      allDivisions returns all divisions where the country ID matches with the division.

    • getDivisionCountry

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Division> getDivisionCountry(int countryId)
      This is the observable list to get a divisions with the matching country ID. This method accesses the database and returns divisions that match with the country ID which is then added to the observable list.
      Specified by:
      getDivisionCountry in interface DBDivision
      Parameters:
      countryId - gets division by country ID.
      Returns:
      divisionCountry returns the division with the correlating country ID.

    • updateDivisionCountry

      public int updateDivisionCountry(String divisionName, int oldCountryId, int newCountryId)
